title: Practical security implementation guides
summary: Users frequently input sensitive data on websites, such as names, addresses, passwords, and banking details. As a web developer, it's crucial to protect this information from bad actors who use a wide range of exploits to steal such information and use it for personal gain. The focus of web security is to help you protect your website against these exploits and secure your users' sensitive data.
pageTitle: Practical security implementation guides - Security on the web | MDN
